name: src/array/array.util.js
src/array/utils/strToArray.js
content:
/**
 * Splits a string to an array on `delimeter`.
 *
 * @category ArrayUtil
 * @param {String} string string to convert to array
 * @param {String} delimiter where to split the string
 * @returns {Array} Returns an array of the split string.
 * @example
 *
 * ArrayUtil.strToArray('apple;banana;orange', ';');
 * // => ['apple', 'banana', 'orange']
 */
const strToArray = (string, delimiter) => string.split(delimiter);

export default strToArray;

name: strToArray
description: Splits a string to an array on `delimeter`.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} Returns an array of the split string.

return.description: Returns an array of the split string.

name: src/boolean/boolean.util.js
src/boolean/utils/toBool.js
toBool
description:
Converts any value to a Boolean equivalent.

**Note:** If no user-defined array is passed, the default true values are: ['true', 'yes', 'y', '1'].

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} Returns a boolean equivalent of the value.

params.name: val
params.description: value to check if true or false

params.name: trueValuesArr
params.description: array of user defined true values

return.description: Returns a boolean equivalent of the value.

content:
# Common Utilities Package

A package of commonly used utilities. Read the docs [here](https://codes-and-coffees.gitbook.io/common-utils-pkg/)

#### Package Details

[![npm version][npm-img]][npm-url]
[![node version][node-img]][node-url]
[![deps][deps-img]][deps-url]
[![downloads][downloads-img]][downloads-url]

#### Repo Details

[![open issues][issues-img]][issues-url]
[![open prs][pr-img]][pr-url]
![code size](https://img.shields.io/github/languages/code-size/codesandcoffees/common-utils-pkg.svg)
[![contributors][contributor-img]][contributor-url]

## Installation

```
npm i --save common-utils-pkg
```

## Getting started

### Import a single utility

```
import ArrayUtil from 'common-util-pkg;
```

### Import multiple utilities

```
import { ArrayUtil, Boolutil, ColorUtil } from 'common-util-pkg';
```

### Use `UNPKG`

To use the latest version

```
<script src="https://unpkg.com/common-utils-pkg"></script>
```

You can also specify a version

```
<script src="https://unpkg.com/common-utils-pkg@1.0.9"></script>
```

Use by getting the exposed 'common-utils-pkg'

```
<script>
  const CU = window['common-utils-pkg];
  CU.ColorUtil.randomPastelColor(); // "hsl(24.380295231593017,27.395530909987613%,86.86101287292395%)"
</script>
```

#### Available Utilities

* ArrayUtil
  * `strToArray(string, delimiter)`
* BoolUtil
  * `toBool(val, [trueValuesArr])`
* ColorUtil
  * `randomPastelColor()`
* DateUtil
* FileUtil
  * `convertBytes(number, [decimals])`
* StringUtil
  * `arrToString(array, delimiter)`
  * `toSentenceCase(string)`
  * `toTitleCase(string)`

## Features

## Commands

## To Do's

* [ ] Proper documentation. Include `arguments` and `return value`
* [ ] Demo playground

<!-- ## Documentation Generation -->
<!-- documentation build src/index.js -f html -o documentation -->

content:
{
  "name": "common-utils-pkg",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "A package of commonly used utilities",
  "main": "./lib/common-utils-pkg.min.js",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "6.26.3",
    "babel-eslint": "8.2.5",
    "babel-loader": "7.1.4",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "0.2.1",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "4.1.6",
    "babel-preset-env": "1.7.0",
    "chai": "4.1.2",
    "cross-env": "5.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "5.0.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "17.0.0",
    "eslint-loader": "2.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "2.13.0",
    "husky": "0.14.3",
    "istanbul": "0.4.5",
    "lint-staged": "7.2.0",
    "mocha": "5.2.0",
    "nyc": "12.0.2",
    "rimraf": "2.6.2",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "1.2.7",
    "webpack": "4.14.0",
    "webpack-cli": "3.0.8",
    "yargs": "12.0.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf lib",
    "build": "npm run test && npm run clean && webpack --env dev && webpack --env build",
    "cover": "cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha src/**/*.spec.js",
    "dev": "webpack --progress --colors --watch --env dev",
    "test": "mocha --require babel-core/register --colors src/**/*.spec.js && eslint src/",
    "test:watch": "mocha --require babel-core/register --colors -w src/**/*.spec.js",
    "prepublish": "npm run build",
    "install-lint": "npm i lint-staged husky",
    "precommit": "lint-staged",
    "esdocs": "rimraf esdocs && ./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.js": [
      "npm run test",
      "npm run cover",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "nyc": {
    "register": "babel-register",
    "include": [
      "src/**/*.js"
    ],
    "exclude": [
      "documentation/*"
    ],
    "require": [
      "babel-register"
    ],
    "reporter": [
      "lcov",
      "text"
    ],
    "sourceMap": false,
    "instrument": false
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+ssh://git@github.com/codesandcoffees/common-utils-pkg.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "utilities",
    "npm",
    "module",
    "javascript",
    "es6",
    "functions"
  ],
  "author": "iamdevlinph@codes-and-coffees",
  "license": "ISC",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/codesandcoffees/common-utils-pkg/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/codesandcoffees/common-utils-pkg#readme",
  "engines": {
    "node": "8.11.1"
  }
}
